author: Fextralife
description:
Blades of Fire Beginner Guide – Best Tips & Tricks to Get Started
Play the Demo Now!👉 https://store.epicgames.com/p/blades-of-fire-demo-78b5d3
https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9n39thqbzpjj
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10011854/
Sponsored by:  MercurySteam & 505 Games

In this Blades of Fire video, I'm going to be giving you guys some helpful tips for those of you who are just starting out with the game. We're going to be talking about combat. We're going to be talking about weapon crafting materials, enemies different factors of the game, and some things that you will figure out eventually but it definitely would be better if you know them at the beginning of the game to save yourself time and frustration.

title: Blades of Fire Beginner Guide – Best Tips & Tricks to Get Started
